sentences.chinese: 一個泌乳期的正常泌乳量平均爲2015。
一個泌乳期的正常泌乳量平均爲2015。

sentences.english: Beral thinks a more interesting candidate for study is prolactin .
sentences.chinese: 貝拉爾認爲，一個更爲有趣的研究課題是泌乳刺激素。

sentences.english: The trial showed that lactating goats can be feeded with whole corn or coarsely cracked corn instead of deeply processed corn.
sentences.chinese: 說明對泌乳羊可採用整粒或粗粉的形式投餵玉米。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical data of 104 patients with prolactin-secreting microadenoma were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性分析104例泌乳素微腺瘤的臨牀資料。

sentences.english: To observe the curative effect of traditional Chinese medicine in treating hyperprolactinemia.
sentences.chinese: 觀察中醫藥治療高泌乳素血癥的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: It is important to choose antipsychotic drugs with little effect on prolactin.
sentences.chinese: 選擇對泌乳素影響小的抗精神病藥物是關鍵。

sentences.english: The progestational hormone of large dose controls the secrete breast function of the element that urge breast.
sentences.chinese: 大劑量的孕激素抑制催乳素的泌乳作用。

sentences.english: Working condition and environment might be one of the factors in the appearence of galactorrhea in women working in these factories.
sentences.chinese: 工作條件與環境可能與工廠女工泌乳的發生有關。

sentences.english: Aspartame has not been shown to have adverse effects on reproductive activity or lactation.
sentences.chinese: 未見阿斯巴甜在生殖行爲和泌乳方面的不良反應。

sentences.english: The lobes are further divided into smaller lobules that produce milk during pregnancy and breast-feeding.
sentences.chinese: 這些小腺葉會在妊娠期和哺育期間分泌乳汁。

sentences.english: In the test 434 udder quarters of 112 lactating cows were enrolled.
sentences.chinese: 對112頭泌乳奶牛的434個乳區進行了檢測。

sentences.english: To observe the therapeutic effect of "Tiaochongren Decoction"in the treatment of hyperprolactinemia.
sentences.chinese: 觀察調衝任方對高泌乳素血癥患者的治療作用。

sentences.english: A popular housing design for cows and heifers alike includes sand bedding.
sentences.chinese: 沙墊牀是泌乳母牛和青年母牛等常用的墊料之一。

sentences.english: A comparative feeding trial was done by using 32 lactating dairy cows fed with biochemical fulvic acid.
sentences.chinese: 通過32頭泌乳奶牛飼餵生化黃腐酸的對比試驗。

sentences.english: They may also contain inappropriate amount of protein and minerals.
sentences.chinese: 泌乳期飼料中的粗蛋白和礦物質含量也不適合犢牛。

definition: to promote lactation/to stimulate lactation (e.g. with drug)
to promote lactation/to stimulate lactation (e.g. with drug)
to suckle/to pump breast milk with a breast pump
